test.name: Login With Invalid Password Should Return 401

kw.name: Create Session
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=api, url=http://localhost:8888, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8888/identity/api/auth/login path_url=/identity/api/auth/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.32.3', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate, br, zstd', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '47', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "test@test.com", "password": "wrong"}'
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.
